          <title>
            <string language="en">Vapour pressure-composition diagram for a hexane-heptane mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dampf Druck-Aufbau Diagramm für eine 
Hexan-Heptan Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de pression-composition en vapeur pour 
un mélange de hexane-heptane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama da pressão-composição do vapor para 
uma mistura do hexane-hexane-heptane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema della pressione-composizione nel vapore 
per una miscela dell'esano-eptano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα πίεση-σύνθεσης ατμού για ένα μίγμα 
εξάνιο-επτανίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de la presio'n-composicio'n del vapor 
para una mezcla del hexane-heptano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how the vapour pressure changes as chemical composition is varied for a mixture of hexane and heptane.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heptane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hexane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mole fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie der 
Dampfdruck ändert, während chemischer Aufbau für eine Mischung des 
Hexans und des Heptans verändert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment la pression de 
vapeur change pendant que la composition chimique est changée pour un
mélange d'hexane et d'heptane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como a pressão do vapor 
muda enquanto a composição química é variada para uma mistura do 
hexane e do heptane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come la pressione del 
vapore cambia mentre la composizione chimica è variata per una 
miscela di esano e dell'eptano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς οι αλλαγές πίεσης 
ατμού ως χημική σύνθεση είναι ποικίλες για ένα μίγμα εξανίου 
και επτανίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo la presión del vapor
cambia mientras que la composición química se varía para una mezcla
del hexane y del heptano.</string>
          </description>
